compatibility.notes: SMAIL-GPL has strong copyleft provisions, meaning any derivative work or combined work must also be licensed under SMAIL-GPL or a compatible license.

key_requirements: Must provide source code or access to it when distributing.
Must not deprive others of the rights granted by this license.
Must inform recipients of their rights under this license.
license.name: SMAIL-GPL
obligations: Distribute verbatim copies of the source code with the same license.
Provide a copy of the license with any distributed copies.
Include a valid copyright notice on all copies.
State any changes made to the files and the date of changes.
License derivative works under the same terms.
